declarations.description: Show confirm dialog before click triggers or form submission
declarations.name: u2-confirm

attributes.name: u2-confirm
attributes.description: If set to true, the confirm will be shown before click triggers or the associated form is submitted. Its value may be a string to be used as the message to show in the confirm dialog. The attribute works for buttons and form-elements.
u2Examples: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: The language to use for internationalization
